attributes.long-description:
Command the amazing powers of Earth’s mightiest alliance! Join the legendary JUSTICE LEAGUE in their quest to defeat a tyrannous evil intent on turning our world into a living nightmare.

Wield extraordinary superpowers in interactive, destructible environments.

Join forces with the world’s most powerful heroes, including SUPERMAN, BATMAN, the FLASH and more.

Team-up with your favorite heroes against vicious and infamous super-villains.

Customize and upgrade your super-hero team using the role-playing style Boost System from game developer Snowblind Studios.

Embark on an adventure crafted by the developer of the CHAMPIONS OF NORRATH™ series and acclaimed writer Dwayne McDuffie.

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service).

attributes.name: Justice League: Heroes™
